sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-navigation-drawer v-model="getDrawer" app>
		<v-img max-height="82" max-width="150" src="@/assets/atmlogo.jpg" class="ml-7">
		</v-img>
		<v-divider></v-divider>
		<v-list>
			<v-list-item v-for="[icon, text] in links" :key="icon" link>
				<v-list-item-icon>
					<v-icon>{{ icon }}</v-icon>
				</v-list-item-icon>

				<v-list-item-content>
					<v-list-item-title>{{ text }}</v-list-item-title>
				</v-list-item-content>
			</v-list-item>
		</v-list>
	</v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from 'vuex'
export default {
	name: 'Sidebar',
	props: ['drawer'],
	data: () => ({
		links: [
			['mdi-microsoft-windows', 'Accueil'],
			['mdi-clipboard-list-outline', 'Achat'],
			['mdi-clipboard-list', 'Vente'],
			['mdi-clipboard', 'Etat'],
			['mdi-account', 'Compte'],
		],
	}),
	computed: {
		getDrawer() {
			return this.$store.state.drawer
		}
	}
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
